lead_paragraph: Didier Drogba indicated on Sunday that he will be returning to Major League Soccer's Montreal Impact, effectively ending speculation that he could be headed back to his former club Chelsea.

headline.print_headline: Drogba Signals Commitment to the Impact
headline.main: Drogba Signals Commitment to the Impact

snippet: Didier Drogba indicated on Sunday that he will be returning to Major League Soccer's Montreal Impact, effectively ending speculation that he could be headed back to his former club Chelsea....
